clinical_study.brief_title: A Clinical Study to Evaluate Efficacy and Safety of HSK21542 for Postoperative Analgesia of Subjects Undergoing Elective Laparoscopic Surgery Under General Anesthesia
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-center, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Phase III Clinical Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of HSK21542 Injection for Postoperative Analgesia of Subjects Undergoing Elective Laparoscopic Surgery Under General Anesthesia

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a multi-center, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled study. A total of 276 subjects undergoing elective laparoscopic surgery under general anesthesia are planned to be enrolled and randomized into 2 groups, i.e., the HSK21542 group (138 subjects) and the placebo group (138 subjects).

primary_outcome.time_frame: Frome administration until 24 hours after administration
primary_outcome.description: The time-weighted SPID at rest within 0-24 h after the first postoperative administration in each group

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Frome administration until 12 hours after administration
secondary_outcome.description: The time-weighted SPID at rest within 0-12 h after the first postoperative administration in each group

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Frome administration until 24 hours after administration
secondary_outcome.description: Cumulative used amount of remedial analgesics (morphine injection, mg) within 0-12 h or 0-24 h after the first postoperative administration in each group, percentage of subjects not using remedial analgesics, and start time of remedial analgesic use

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Frome administration until 24 hours after administration
secondary_outcome.description: The PID at rest at each scoring time point after the first postoperative administration in each group

secondary_outcome.measure: The proportion of subjects with a NRS of ≤ 3
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Frome administration until 24 hours after administration
secondary_outcome.description: The ratio of subjects with NRS score ≤ 3 at 12 h or 24 h after the first postoperative administration in each group

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence and severity of AEs
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from signing the informed consent form to the follow-up period (D8 ± 1 postoperative).
